AssociateNode.name: AssociateNode
AssociateNode.description: Associate a node to a configuration management server.

CreateBackup.name: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.description: Create a backup for the specified server.

DeleteBackup.name: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.description: Delete the specified backup and possibly its S3 bucket.

DeleteServer.name: DeleteServer
DeleteServer.description: Deletes the specified server with his corresponding CF stack and possibly the S3 bucket.

DescribeAccountAttributes.name: DescribeAccountAttributes
DescribeAccountAttributes.description: Describe the service limits for the user's account.

DescribeBackups.name: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.description:
Describe a single backup, all backups of a specified server or all backups of the
                                                user's account.

DescribeEvents.name: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.description: Describe all events of the specified server.

DescribeNodeAssociationStatus.name: DescribeNodeAssociationStatus
DescribeNodeAssociationStatus.description: Describe the association status for the specified node token and the specified server.

DescribeServers.name: DescribeServers
DescribeServers.description: Describes the specified server or all servers of the user's account.

DisassociateNode.name: DisassociateNode
DisassociateNode.description: Disassociates a specified node from a server.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: List the tags that are applied to the specified server or backup.

RestoreServer.name: RestoreServer
RestoreServer.description: Applies a backup to specified server. Possibly swaps out the ec2-instance if specified.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Applies tags to the specified server or backup.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Removes tags from the specified server or backup.

UpdateServerEngineAttributes.name: UpdateServerEngineAttributes
UpdateServerEngineAttributes.description: Update server settings specific to the configuration management type.
